column3: “I suffer from terrible insomnia and Afghani is by far the best I've tried for this.  Normal couchlock" indicas seem to have very little sedative effect on me
column4: but this Afghani stuff has managed to actually WORK :).  All most of the other ones did was get me high and make me even more awake.  Not Afghani.  Took about a tenth of a gram 20 minutes ago and I'm feeling like I will be able to sleep tonight.  No big

column3: “the first grow i ever saw in person was afghani. my first attempt to cultivate consisted of a silly little ol  150wtt HPS light , an afghani clone, and the bottom of a towel closet at the end of a hallway. this is the strain responsible for my love/lust/addiction to couch-lock inducing flowers. instant ADHD medicine. i just found an almost forgotten, gallon size baggie in the freezer that i'd originally gotten full o...”

“I was in the US Army for 3 years until I decided to come out of the closet for being gay I left the service.  Anyway while I was in the army I was stationed in Afghanistan, and a few soldiers had a strain there called Afgan ( I'm not 100% sure if this is it or not) Anyway that weed made me really relaxed and sleepy. It was very good to get a nights rest if under shell shock or gunfire.”

“Very strong smell. A little leathery like Jack Herer. Sweet citrus notes, mostly lemon. An underlying earthy dankness. A bit of a Nag Champa hint upon tasting the unlit joint. Smoke is thick, pungent and lingering. Charges like a bull right out of the gate with a heavy stone and body high. This is a favorite strain of mine because of its ability to stamp out my muscle spasms and Sciatica almost instantly. It's one of...”

“This strain was suggested to me based on wanting a pure indica. I learned that this is a landrace strain because it's named after the region it naturally grows in.
The batch I purchased came from World of Weed in Tacoma, WA. The grower was Triple T Farms, harvested on 9/01/2015 and packaged on 9/25/2015. I usually break a bud and inhale nice and deep to get the nose - it smells like a bowl of sunflower shells mixed w...”
“This is one heavy strain, let me say a little bit of this herb goes along way.☠”

“A very old very, very pure Indica. The guy I used to get my old school hash from used this strain, getting back to school after lunch was always a challenge. The buds are dense bright green with lot's of orange red hairs. It's an amazing hash plant, the buds just drip resin. The  smell is nice too very earthy and sweet have smoked this in flower, oil, bubble,  dry sift, and finger hash form and it tastes fucken great...”
“if u want to get down in your dreams and sleep like a baby, just take a couple hits”

“New favorite indy. I picked up a little sac of this with a buddy not that long ago and didn't know much what to expect. It hits HARD we lit up the first bowl with a third friend who had never smoked before and got a good light toasting in. After say 20 minutes we decided a second bowl was needed as we wanted to try and get out friend high her first time. Once we packed that second bowl it was all over, the maybe 40 y...”
“thus made me feel very aroused and carefree. all around happiness”
“Love the smell, love how relaxed I am. Great for my pain. One of my favourites so far!”

“Out of all the strains I have had so far for my insomnia, this is by far the best. I started vaping about an hour before I went to sleep. Normally I suffer from restless leg syndrome from a medication I take, but with this.. I just felt my whole body relax and felt my head just melt into the pillow. I woke up this morning feeling very well rested! I only woke up once during the early morning hours (Thanks, to my jerk...”

“Everyone grows this around here so I smoked good Afghani and shitty Afghani. I think It's no need to write long description about this. Smoke too much and you'll wake up the next day without any idea of how you fell asleep or take a one huge hit and you'll feel like a Terminator. And if I can help you, NEVER smoke this from Hookah, it will destroy you like a lil' bitch. It's classic for me and I recommend this to eve...”

“I vaporized Afghani in the form of C02 oil. Very deep indica stone. Heavy limbs, and eyes. A total melting away of every care in the world. Moderate narcotic-like euphoria. Amazing for pain, depression, and insomnia. This is definitely one of my favorite concentrate strains, great for hash-making.”
“I'm a big fan of Afghani landrace strains. All of them are good. They all taste and smell like hash. They all put you to bed and kill your pain. Two thumbs way up.”

“I couldn't believe it... this is a great strain. But, I went to a local dispensary who tried to tell me that Afgani was a pure Sativa??????????????  I Laughed and walked out...QUICKLY !!!!!  Be careful of what you are buying and who you are buying it from !  Keep it Real people”
“I'm a big fan of Afghani landrace strains. All of them are good. They all taste and smell like hash. They all put you to bed and kill your pain. Two thumbs way up.”

“I couldn't believe it... this is a great strain. But, I went to a local dispensary who tried to tell me that Afgani was a pure Sativa??????????????  I Laughed and walked out...QUICKLY !!!!!  Be careful of what you are buying and who you are buying it from !  Keep it Real people”

“This is the best I've had so far for insomnia. It's a heavy indica, excellent for sleep, also helped relax muscles tight from a back injury (smoke this plus IcyHot = heaven for pulled muscles!). It's very good for people suffering from high anxiety who carry a lot of their stress around in the body. I did have some dizzyness from it but nothing severe. I wouldn't smoke this as a day-time weed unless you want to sleep...”

“I am really digging the vibes from this one. Its like wearing a happy tranquility helmet. That's my best description and I'm sticking to it.


Mental abilities are greatly slowed and we are one with the universe. Kind of hippie trippy. Try this one.

 Be prepared to talk a lot and very loudly, it just can't be stopped.”

“Tilray Patient:

Excellent strain, very effective for managing PTSD symptoms. Felt very uplifted and happy, without a care in the world.  Accompanied with a nice body high, which makes for excellent pain reduction.”

“You'll feel it from the exhale, but you'll also feel it creep up on you again later.  Leaves a nice dream-like buzz after the initial high.  Very energetic, focused, creative and tingly.  Definitely worth trying, feels like a dream!”

“Body high is intense and quick to set in. Taste was very light, and quite pleasant. Extremely resinous and potent. 3 or 4 hits and I was so high, I was fist-bumping Jesus. I definitely recommend this for light-weights, because it takes very little to get you where you need to be. I wouldn't smoke this early on in the day, unless you're ready to just chill or nap. I also wouldn't recommend smoking this in a place wher...”

“First observation is that it’s absolutely stellar for video games! Initial part of the high is very strong and almost overwhelming in a good way (like Fire OG). Where it really excels is by dialing up how fun and engaging gaming is - it’s an utter blast! Separately, watching a Seth Rogen stoner comedy on this made me feel like I was in their exact same mental state. Strong, trippy disassociation while your sense of h...”

“You'll feel it from the exhale, but you'll also feel it creep up on you again later.  Leaves a nice dream-like buzz after the initial high.  Very energetic, focused, creative and tingly.  Definitely worth trying, feels like a dream!”

“This was an Afghani Landrace.  Landrace is the pure form of the strain that it's only modification is from it's natural environment - pure strain Afghani - and it is so good.  Top notch and a pleasure to find and enjoy.”
“If you are already tired, this will turn you into a space cadet and may not provide the relaxed giggles you might get otherwise.”

“A true delight from the east, Afghani will not disappoint those looking for a soothing, blissful relaxation. After being a lover and regular consumer of strains like King Louis XIII and Northern Lights, which are descended from Afghani genetics, I felt I needed to try the real thing. My experience exceeded my expectations. Afghani packs a sedating heavy indica punch that will obliterate pain and anxiety..Mannnn I'm t...”

“I have been using various strains to treat my chronic insomnia. I have used PK, BSR, KOS, and a few other heavy Indica's. This AFG has been the best so far. I highly recommend it for treating insomnia. 
The flavor is mild, classic, no cough at all. I use it in CO2 oil form.
Great strain!”
“there is no better meds for sleep than this, exept  mabe  medicne man,zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!!!”

“I am so thankful I got to try this when a little bit rolled through my town. The leaves were an orange-brown colour, the bud was practically orange and yellow, and the trichomes were green and whitish/yellow. Very sexy looking ! I had 2 large bong hits and a small joint .. it wasn't long after until I passed out. All I remember was that it was potent as fuck, reminded me of how I felt on codeine, and that it was goin...”
“Has this from High Mountain Health as Sweet Afgani Delicious" and while the nose/taste wasnt what I would consider sweet or delicious
column4: the effects were! Nice fast acting but not overpowering. Great for pain management and relaxing throughout the day or before bed. Cant wait to try it again

column3: “there is no better meds for sleep than this, exept  mabe  medicne man,zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!!!”

“I have been using various strains to treat my chronic insomnia. I have used PK, BSR, KOS, and a few other heavy Indica's. This AFG has been the best so far. I highly recommend it for treating insomnia. 
The flavor is mild, classic, no cough at all. I use it in CO2 oil form.
Great strain!”

“Smoked a bowl last night and i must say i slept like a baby! Onset is fast but you dont feel tired, you can still concentrate. I watched a two episodes of rick and morty and i followed the story well. When i was ready to sleep i put my head on the pillow and i was lights out. Great for insomnia or to treat night terrors and anxiety.”
“Mellow; time seemed to slow a bit after smoking my homegrown indoor buds. Very relaxing.”

“I had to come write another review, because the strain keeps impressing me every time I smoke it. Not only has this Indica put me to sleep in the middle of the day (which never happens), it also makes me extremely happy. Stressed? Get to Sacred Seed and get some Afghani ;)”
“Really happy, energetic, creative and talkative high :D. Love it!”
“posting my complete review on thecloudedgarden.wordpress.com”

“It was during a pilgrimage through the Hindu Kush Mountain range when I met an old mystic. He taught me the art of telekinesis and told stories of the ancient ones. We entered the main temple room. Seated in the lotus position, standing 45 feet tall was a, no not a
column4: the" statue of the Green Goddess. The same goddess who traveled from the  Sirius to Earth with an experimental herb capable of positively affecting th...”"

column3: “Really happy, energetic, creative and talkative high :D. Love it!”

“Smoked a bowl last night and i must say i slept like a baby! Onset is fast but you dont feel tired, you can still concentrate. I watched a two episodes of rick and morty and i followed the story well. When i was ready to sleep i put my head on the pillow and i was lights out. Great for insomnia or to treat night terrors and anxiety.”
“Mellow; time seemed to slow a bit after smoking my homegrown indoor buds. Very relaxing.”

“Original Afgani # 1 from sensi seeds is great.  Not too many of the new afgani hybrids hold up to the original.  Not to great of a smoke with the bud and leaf, but excellent for making medicinal grade extracts.  Good for narcotic pain and insomnia.”
“Good strain for the initial high. As you come down, you have an awful headache.”

“I absolutely love this strain. I suffer from a closed mild traumatic brain injury and have trouble sleeping and intermittent chronic pain. THIS STRAIN is the only one consistent in alleviating my symptoms! I always feel deep, intense relief and can go right to sleep and stay asleep all night. I vape it at night right before I turn off the light. I'm never without it. This is my go to meds when I'm in crisisnot never ...”
“By far my favourite nighttime strain.  As I have Relapse Remitting MS, this completely relieves of any pain, muscle spasms etc and makes it easy to drift off and into a deep sleep.”

“Great for pain. It reduced my back pain and relieved a significant amount of the muscle tightness and spasming that my injury brings on. This really doesn't seem like a recreational strain - for me, at least - but it's great medicine. Before vaping, I gave the bud a sniff: a very full and rich spicy scent. The taste upon vaping was heavy and thick, yet very pleasant. Moments after inhaling I could feel my muscles dis...”

“I had to come write another review, because the strain keeps impressing me every time I smoke it. Not only has this Indica put me to sleep in the middle of the day (which never happens), it also makes me extremely happy. Stressed? Get to Sacred Seed and get some Afghani ;)”
“Really happy, energetic, creative and talkative high :D. Love it!”
“this strain is awesome and makes you feel very relax and helps the pain go away I really liked it”

“Perfect bud for body high, absolutely gorgeous tingly sensation. It will kill any pain you have and make you feel like you're sinking into the couch. Smells great, tastes kinda nasty honestly but it's bearable. Nostalgic to me, it's one of my first choices for body high but I like that you're brain can still feel wrecked if you smoke enough.”

“This strain was available for a limited time at one dispensary in town and was described as a relaxation strain with little to no head high.  The first time I tried this, about 1 hour before bed time, was amazing.  I truly did not feel much if any head high but immediately felt relaxed.  It was a body relaxation but not sleepy or couch locked.  Within about 30 minutes I felt ready for bed, again not crashing tired ju...”

“This was too heavy for me, personally; just a tad bit too intense, made me nauseous and the high was a bit extreme- bordered spirit-quest level. I did enjoy the experience afterwards, definitely makes me consider DMT.”

“Afghani is a traditional strain collected in the mountains of Afghanistan  It was one of the first pure indica strains used in worldwide breeding. It is well known for its excellent properties for hashish.”

“My favorite MaryJane origin. The ideal strain to sedate efficiently for a moment with nothing much to do than be very quiet. To be honest this is perfect if you want to stare at your bedsheet or maybe your wrist... Or your hand. Anyway don't worry it's ok, it's pungent, you are well, hold o... Zzzz.”

“Relaxing without being sedative, a great combo. Feel I can smoke and smoke and not get sleepy. Very clear-headed and focused, but a creative free-associative headspace is still accessible. Took 7-8 small bong rips, went for a run, ended up going longer than expected. Headspace became very altered. Took another 7-8 small bong rips, did some work with a repetitive strain injury. The Afghani gives me a clear body sense,...”
“great for pain. its strong, and very relaxing.”

“On it own, Afghani was a very good indica strain for sex. It came close to the ideal indica experience: reducing anxiety, promoting relaxation, slowing things down, and heightening sensations. It was an excellent melt into each other strain. The only downside was that it was hard to use for night time sex because it made us (mostly me) too sleepy.  Where Afghani really excelled was in pairing with anxiety-producing s...”

“a little goes a long way, it's super strong, so start small. it takes a bit longer than other strains to hit me, a full 3-5min, which tempts me to smoke more, but I get nauseous and anxious if I overdo it, so just be patient! it's both a cerebral and body high that makes you happy, carefree, sleepy, and a bit horny.”

“My favorite MaryJane origin. The ideal strain to sedate efficiently for a moment with nothing much to do than be very quiet. To be honest this is perfect if you want to stare at your bedsheet or maybe your wrist... Or your hand. Anyway don't worry it's ok, it's pungent, you are well, hold o... Zzzz.”

“MyPotLog. One of the best strains of Cannabis I am growing, the buds are dense and hard. When smoked, the aroma is sharp.  The effects are energizing and uplifting while providing distinct pain relief for my arthritic hips - great smoke in the morning for a busy day.”
“Great pick for night time.”

“Perfect bud for body high, absolutely gorgeous tingly sensation. It will kill any pain you have and make you feel like you're sinking into the couch. “Afghani is a very potent strain that is good for insomnia patients.”
“Remarkable pain reduction,excellent stress relief....perfect remedy to a bad week....requires further study.”
“Cost/Value ratio, I love this stuff. Lights well when you ignite it, tastes good, and doesn't get you too damn stoney you can't sip on a bit more as the night goes on.”

“Now we are getting to my favoured Landrace strain of pain numbing Cannabis.  I first had grown my first Afghani in 1980 in North Vancouver where I had a one of my latest indoor grow of the time with 60 plants equally divided between Afghani and Skunk my original favoured to this day.
The Afghani I grew to seven feet as my roof was twelve feet then I was then vegging nearly three months to get the height wanted as C. ...”

“Migraine pain 6-7; nausea 7 when I medicated round 2000 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Nausea gone; ate a good dinner I think! Pain all but gone (3). Sucked that some of it was still there but o boy was there wonderful pain relief! Dis one definitely a sleeper. Don't expect to get much done but sleep! Body high & head high were very nice. But not the best; ...”
“this strain is now on my top 5 fav list :) I like the taste, very relaxing. I will be getting this again very soon”
“This is one of my favorite indica strain. It has a sweet, fruity smell with a sticky resin left on my lips. Great euphoria with complete body relaxation.”
“This strain is one of the best total sedation strains I have tried. If you want all pain and anxiety and worry to be gone you have to try. Will not disappoint!”

80% indica 

Classic Indica”

“I enjoy this when Im looking for a strain to clear my head, and keep it fogged. It helps with nausea in most cases Ive experienced”
“Pain relief”
“Good high. Feel relaxed in just a small amount. Take a bit more and your whole body tingles. This is a good before bed strain.”

“Full body smile. That's the easiest and best way I would describe this strain. My face has a smile on it too; this is a wonderful calm down and feel good strain. I take about 6-7 hits of this from a vape pen and everything is comfortable, whatever is coming, I've got this. Or if I don't I guess I don't much give a crap, so whatever, haha. I'll miss this when it's gone and will buy more when I have the chance.”
“Nice strain. Heavy high. Crash made me sleepy. But very calming high. Helpful for pain”
“One of my fav. of all time. It makes you relaxed and  all of your pain and stressed is vanished.”

“This one I got the seeds in BC. House of the Great Gardener. The smell of the herb is quite fantastic. It smells like somebody sprayed an orange and lemon juice in the room. I think I can roll all day smoking this one, even knowing the heavy Indica effect. This strain is different and I recommend you share it! Such smooth feeling.”
“Fantastic, good taste, nice aroma, I'm feeling sleepy, pretty much relaxed, I enjoy music a little bit more, I feel rather hungry too.”

“Love it. Ultra mild best one of the best 
I love it smoking with a pipe.
Take bud shots. Snipping the head off
Bupppp😚💨💨💨”
“The perfect smoke/experience. Ideal body & mind ‘high’ Say yes to Land Race strains. It’s what nature intended.”

“I have the wax, and after a couple of hits I'm fully lifted. I don't feel couch bound or tired. Also feel like I could go to sleep pretty fast if I wanted to. Definitely good for pain, because of the slight body buzz you get from it. Very nice mellow high. I'm usually a Sativa smoker, and I even enjoy this high. Probably my favorite Indica I've smoked. Would recommend.”
“one of our favs! haven't had any around in 2 years now :(”
“Great indica for late nights when you get off work roll a dubb load the bowl and relax”
“one of my all time favorites and go to strain for stress and anxiety”

“Great strain! Surprisingly light pleasant taste, fruity light neon green with some darkening and dark red hairs and loaded with sugary resin. Good instantly stress relief and will make you sleepy. Downside is i don’t think it went super deep into pain for muscle spasms- more for sleep and anxiety!”

“Body buzz?  I’ve been reading about different strains causing a body buzz, so I’d try them and...nothing.  Well, fast forward to yesterday when I FINALLY found some afghani here in Denver.  Smoked one huge hit from a bowl (I’ve a very low tolerance) and HOLY CRAP!  I’ve never feel like that before!  It seriously felt as if I was on a boat amid small waves.  My body literally felt like it was bobbing up and down in th...”
“very nice calm feeling very mellow good for pain”
“Great all around high.  Not bad but not the best.  Will smoke again”
“A bit of a harsh smoke but overall a great flavor. I dig the buzz this created for me.”

“I mostly use oils for pain control, but Afghani is worth vaping for quick relief of fibromyalgia pain, tension and general discomfort. Within 20 minutes of vaping I get a warm, tingly body stone, relaxing as a warm bath, with a good 2-hours relief: a great way to span the gap while waiting for oils or edibles to take effect.”
“Great relaxation”
“Awesome for pain. Nice high as well.”
“Makes me very lazy, nice buzz but ive definatley smoked better bud.”

“Smell is very distinguishable. Taste is interesting and smoke is fairly thin. Due to the density, bowls tend to last a lot longer than expected and due to the high THC content, it is a resin producer. Great for any kind of chronic pain or just to relax after a hard days work. Looks great, very distinguishable crystals, especially if grown with limited mold or indoor.”
“Super sleepy vibes, consistently. Never a let down, seems to be real common strain to find.”
“This is a potent strain that I honestly underestimated. A very heavy and sedating “couch lock” high. I smoked half of a joint of this stuff and had to take a break. Dope for sleep and relaxation.”

“Such a wonderful classic. It has an earthy, spicy and exotic aroma, it has heavily relaxing effects. It melts away stress. Improves appetite. Knocks out pain. Great for c-ptsd. Only con is dry mouth.”
“My fave right now...nice dense aromatic buds with a smooth taste and slow burn.”
“Well rounded indica comparable to AK, OGK, Durban Poison and some good Thai. Brown and hairy, dark green if you have legit stuff. Premium high, enjoy!”

“Indica strain of the week: Afghani. This one is a “straight up” indica, often bred with other strains to create interesting hybrids. Tiny buds, not that it’s a problem. Sticky. Scent reminds me of a Christmas tree. Deep indica high, and strong at 22.4%. More than the usual amount of CBD also, at 0.41%. Good price, just $37 for a quarter after the tax...The only tax I don’t mind paying. Recommended. #IndicaStrainOfThe...”
“Great for watching South Park .”
“Some knock you out dank.💯”
“Smooth and unobtrusive on the psyche, and great in edibles.”

“My fiance' and I tried this strain and immediately fell into the giggle fits. Definitely a good relaxing strain. I had a little bit of nausea but that eventually subsided after consuming an entire pizza. 9.5/10”

“My fiance' and I tried this strain and immediately fell into the giggle fits. Definitely a good relaxing strain. I had a little bit of nausea but that eventually subsided after consuming an entire pizza. 9.5/10”
“pretty good head high. doesn't take too much to feel it.”

“In the early 70`s i was in my twenty`s and have been smoking f/ 55 yrs.Back then it was nice big very skunky buds,the flavor matched along w/ the sweetness and incredible munchy laden,relaxing high.It`s still the same today just no skunk,but earthiness and spice and a bit of sweetness but the high is still there just a little different.Will always love Afgani!”

“This strain is very ancient and a favorite of mine.I love it both the flower and wax have a lovely flavor. I also like this strain because if it's potency and medical benefits. I would describe it's effects as happy, uplifting, euphoric and also alert, energetic. It also has the benefits of a relaxing body high, allowing my muscles to relax and therefore beridding my pain.”

“This strain literally has me stuck to my chair, super dank and super euphoric. My eyes are geeking! It has a great pine smell to it, taste isn’t too bad either. Head high is out of this WORLD, I’m on Cloud 9 frfr. Relaxed sensations from head to toe, all pain relieved. Highly recommend it.”
“Definitely felt the indica 😂😂”
“it was good, was not an overwhelming smoke could function all day.”
“make no mistake this is a pure indica strain and your not gonna feel like doin much if you smoke a j of this.  made me very sleepy and lazy.”

“THIS IS THE FIRE!!!!! I wasn't home but made feel like I was home. FLY,INCREDIBLE,AMAZING,LIT, you call it, it earns it. Made me thinking about moving to Afghanistan to acquire more, or just go to the dispensary that would be easier. I'm McLovin it.”
“Strong body high and makes you not feeling your skin. A bit trippy while I was sunbathing.”

“Very nice relaxing strain. If you have problems relaxing or sleeping this strain may be for you. It has a wonderful earthy smell and nice green nugs. “Very good. High quality. Beware the couch lock,”

“I use cannabis primarily for managing my anxiety, atopic dermatitis (eczema) and insomnia. This strain has proved to be amazing at helping me relax and get to sleep. I mainly vaped but I also used the ABV to make a tea with milk and honey and the tea proved to be absolutely amazing at helping me sleep. This strain is de...”

“Cherry Afghan shatter great strain PR for sure even body high I felt my 3rd eye come to light with this strain.High felt like I was in zen with Shark Shock CBD flower.
Taste pop of light Cherry Skoal skunk taste amazing.
Love this strain during the day.
High lasted lasted a long time anxiety free for more than 4-6 hr's.”
“Good”

“Although I paid way too much for this 500mg Reef Cola oil cartridge in CO, I'm quickly happy w/ 1 hit. That's rare. 
Harsh as a motha to vape, but worth it. This will be that fine champagne when celebrating, when needing a happy numb body, or when no other indica will do. 
This be some mighty fine shit. Classic for a reason. 👌👍”
“Good”

“Although I paid way too much for this 500mg Reef Cola oil cartridge in CO, I'm quickly happy w/ 1 hit. That's rare.

“Very heavily sedating Indica. Perfect for late evening use, since it will likely make you tired. I had this in the form of shatter from Phyto Extract. Thinking back on it now, I should have saved this for night time because it made me veg right out. 

Medically, it made the pain from my hip completely disappear (broke and dislocated my hip, fractured femur years ago).”
“A nice late evening smoke as things are winding down. Good mellow conversation. Doesn’t taste so great and can be a little harsh but that only lasts a moment.”
“I liked this strain quite a bit.”

“got some top shelf Afghani (cost the same as the caviar) and it was not a bad decision few hits you are high and it's enjoyable not overwhelming. its beautiful bud with a very distinct taste and smell”

“got some top shelf Afghani (cost the same as the caviar) and it was not a bad decision few hits you are high and it's enjoyable not overwhelming. its beautiful bud with a very distinct taste and smell”

“My all around favorite medicine. Narcotic AF! Only from Oregrown”
“Very potent strain with true Indica characteristics. This weed should be enjoyed at night time because it will ease you into a body high that turns into dream land.”

“I agree with the current average of this strain, 4.2. If you like hard-hitting indicas that have a tendency to put you on the couch, then this is definitely your baby. “one of my favorite strains overall. This strain has a very relaxed feel and great body high. I gave it a four star because I felt like I was unproductive when I needed to get a few things done. If you smoke this strain you will get the munchies 100%.”

column4: making your face seem weighted with eyelid droop. Make sure you've got a great beverage or snack as it's got a harsher taste with resulting drymouth. Not a great social...”"

column3: “Strong body high and makes you not feeling your skin. A bit trippy while I was sunbathing.”
“For the price this is a good deal for maintenance buzzers, it's cost effective and long lasting buzz. It is a relaxing buzz, to my liking, one of my favorite insomnia busters.”
“Very powerful, earthy and a strong pine scent. Wonderful head and body high . . .”

“Tilray patient review here. This strain tastes awful. I tried the CBD variety of this strain. The effects were good. Nothing spectacular. It's more of a CBD high than a THC high. Mellowed me out a bit, killed some body pain, and reduced stress and anxiety. The reason I rated it so low wasn't because of poor quality. This strain tastes awful. I used a good quality vape and it doesn't matter. It tasted like bitter scor...”

“i thought because its a heavy indica it will shut me down.
it actually made me feel awake but relaxed at the same time.
i have used better strains but this one is fine.
i would recommend using this strain while gaming and watching videos.”

“Over all a very nice Indica strain vapes nice but I have found it somewhat euphoric where as purple Hawaiian was better. In lieu of that it left me a bit dizzy but also focused. It's better in smaller doses over time rather big multiple hits.”

“Like some other reviewers, I suffer from awful anxiety-fueled insomnia but Afghani lets me sleep like a baby. 

It's also easy to grow, so it's a great beginner strain for home/hobbyist growers.”
“Good”
“Beautiful, dense buds. Diesel-y smell but fruity taste. Euphoric, relaxing high. Would definitely buy again.”
“Good Good. Reminded me of my first time getting high of of some shit called Spicy Gumball. Everything felt slow and it was that feeling you get when you're in a strobe light room.”
“Gorgeous citrus smelling - tight buds that bust up nice and fluffy. Great head and body high, totally a night time selection.”
“really great strain. you will note that it doesnt really give you couchlock even though its a strong indica. I picked some up from weemedical. would definitely recommend 9/10”

“This strain was the first I'd ever tried. I still enjoy it to this day, but it puts you in a couch lock like no other. the smell is skunky, but if you just want to relax or go to sleep, this is the strain for you than.”
“Pretty decent and lasting high for me. Taste was nice and smoke was smooth.”

“By far my favorite Indica. Me and my friend bought an eighth of it this last week and we smoked one bowl and I got hit hard. Got a very substantial head buzz and directly went inside. 

Afghani seems to me like a very powerful sleep-inducing strain and it also makes me pretty hungry. 

We smoked with our friend who had never smoked before and she got quite high and we all enjoyed the fuck out of the Babadook. Afterwa...”
“Amazing grass how sweet the weed!🤣”
“purchased at SWC tempe And unfortunately I only feel a limited effect then it goes away quick.”
“Did not provide the needed sleepiness, but was something to smoke if you are bored.”
“Insanely good, very strong mental high, definite couch lock.”

“Very uplifting, helped me deal with my annoyingly late boyfriend. Instead I was super chill and a fight was avoided! 
This can also be a very spiritually enlightening strain as well aiding in meditation. 
Instant anxiety curb. Recommend smoking on an empty stomach. Food will eventually bring you back down and into a yawning sleepy happy place”
“So many long winded reviews. Smokes good. Gets me lifted. But not too lifted. I fall asleep well, and easy. Taste is earthy and a bit harsh. Great for relaxing, or any kind of lounge act.”
“One of the best indica strain i've ever had. I became really comfortable and hungry. Too much of this and u might wanna go to sleep.”

“That light scent that can be described as wood/fresh earth.
Taste is incredibly mellow.
Calming yet assertive effects engulf you.
Total body coverage and full face goes sweetly numb.
That's a 10.”
“Notes of lemon, *smacking lip sound* a hint of...hickory. You can really taste the high settling in. I need more...”
“I love sweet fresh afghani.  Also Afghani/Hindu mix was good.  Good for sitting down to do my work.  Nice head high.  A little too much and start to get sleepy.”
“Soooooo nice for bedtime. Great earthy strain with wonderful effects.”
“love it,  it's a great overall relaxing high.  it's working great for getting ptsd in check when I'm feeling hypervigilant.  really allows me to function daily from rise to sleep.”
“VERY strong couchlock. Overall quite enjoyable.”
“I like this for when I want to do nothing but kick back and feel no pain and just be....”
“By far the best indica I've had. To bad I can't find any nearby.”

“it is a landrace strain, but there are so many strain variants with unique flavors and medicinal effects. I believe Afghani will be a staple strain into perpetuity, but nothing trend setting about this one.”
“Original taste and aroma, just like the hippies used to smoke back in the day!  Totally relaxing and chill body high, good for appetite, sleep and muscle spasms.”
“Nice bud, the buzz is pretty mellow, with a feeling of sleepiness. body feels good, head does too!”
“More having please”

“Wonderful deep diesel smell before it's broken up.  Once ground, the flower really releases it's wonderful full bodied scents.  the smoking experience is also very flavorful.  The strong oils shine through with a heavy taste on the tongue and great grapefruit after notes.  Wonderful when hanging out with friends because of the great conversations that start when your mind is opened with this staple strain.”
“Great for watching South Park .”
“Afghani is a nice, very clean smoke. It looks and tastes like what most would call the Traditional Indica". It has a nice mellow high that could be good for many starters
column4: but more seasoned veterans may find it a little lacking.”"

column3: “Afghani from tilray: Excellent smell with a okay taste however the clear headed high and early onset of hunger make this a great strain”
“2nd favorite that shit is good asf”
“Can't wait to see/smoke the end product!”
“This high really creeps up on you. Almost faced a whole one before I actually realized I was gone”

“This was my first time with Tilary's high CBD strain. I didnt care for it. Found it was very weak took double the amount to work then my Equinox I got last time. I do understand this is very different, but I am poor and this was too expensive for effects. It was excellent for sleeping, complete body effects little head effects. I would not get this again didn't help my migraines at all. It would be great for sleeping...”
“wow.”

“Second time smoking this strain and I have to say, I didn't appreciate it as much as i should have last time. The cola smell is amazing and this has the perfect strength for a nightcap. Super pleasant body stone, I'm chill af, meng.”
“Strong indica body effects. I only use this before sleep. I'd like it more if it had more relaxing, de-stressing head effects.”
“Jah’s love since the beginning of time. Mother: Pure 100% indica. Straight from the Hindu Kush Moutains of Afghanistan.”
“One of the first grows I ever saw featured an pure Afghani straight that was straight kill!, circa 1997 Pittsburgh,PA.  Still to this day one of the best.”
“Pretty easy to grow, I recommend for the first culture”
“one of my favorites”
“Honestly a Blessing”
“A truly relaxing indica.”
“Great mellow buzz, good when used to ease into the weekend”
“in my top 5 (maybe 3)”

“Very good strain, adequate sleep medicine and also great against pain. It smells very pungent. The taste is earthy and a bit similar as Sugar Kush. This is a kind of strain that i smoke when I am a evening home alone. You won't need much to get the yob done. Very Potent!”
“Anxiety lifts away, left relaxed and contemplative. I space out completely on Afghani.”

“Very relaxing! My boyfriend, who doesn't smoke often, wanted to try this strain and loved it. He said he was high immediately and enjoyed not having to wait to see how high he would get. As a regular smoker I found it hard hitting and very enjoyable.”
“its a spicy meme”
“Only tried this strain once but loved it one of my ultimate favorites!!”

“One if the best indica I have smoked.
Rolled 5 grams instantly got stoned. It feels so good and time is passing so fucking slow. Gets you relaxed and thoughtful but also happy. But the munchies are killers and also the dry eyes are the 2 bad things about this strain otherwise its perfect and very potent, as I said from 5 grams I felt like crushed. A must try in my opinion.”
“Not into the couch lock, but of the Indica's I've had this is better than the rest.”

“Full body smile. That's the easiest and best way I would describe this strain. My face has a smile on it too; this is a wonderful calm down and feel good strain. I'll miss this when it's gone and will buy more when I have the chance.”
“The perfect smoke/experience. Ideal body & mind ‘high’ Say yes to Land Race strains. It’s what nature intended.”

“Nice easy grow for beginners.”

“I’m an incomplete quadriplegic and this strain is one of my favorites. “SUPER HEAVY INDICA STRAIN. This really will put you in the couch. Great for pain, insomnia, and relaxation. Not for novices”

I also have severe social anxiety, typically after I use cannabis I will seclude myself in order to avoid said anxiety. However with this strain ...”

“Been struggling with anxiety and stress lately): found a child of this strain, Afghani Grapefruit, at one of my local shops here in Denver. “I found this Indic to be nice and strong. Super relaxing healing all body pain. I suffer from a hip issue had surgery to fix it and my hip pain came back but to an accident. This flower helps me sleep all through the night.”
“It’s great! Leaves me relaxed yet still productive”
“Great smell. It didnt make me drowsy it kept me alert and focused through an entire movie (which is hard to do high) i like this strain a lot.”

“My favorite strain, this shit is fire af🔥👌”

“Goooood”
“Definitely one of my favorites. I love Indicas and this one was by far the best, it was a challenge for me to walk just off of 2 bowls but I continued and did 7 of this wonderful strain.”

“Super relaxing”

last longing high with such little”

“Not to be messed with.”

“I love this this stuff! I suffer from anxiety, panic attacks, MS etc... And I love that it gives you a good brain buzz then slowly relaxes you and takes your mind off the pain and chills u out. Helps me sleep, this strain is great for that total relaxation! Love it!!!”
“Great relaxation”
“This is a potent strain that I honestly underestimated. A very heavy and sedating “couch lock” high. I smoked half of a joint of this stuff and had to take a break. Dope for sleep and relaxation.”

Downside is i don’t think it went super deep into pain for muscle spasms- more for sleep and anxiety!”
“Good high. Feel relaxed in just a small amount. Take a bit more and your whole body tingles. This is a good before bed strain.”

“I mostly use oils for pain control, but Afghani is worth vaping for quick relief of fibromyalgia pain, tension and general discomfort. Within 20 minutes of vaping I get a warm, tingly body stone, relaxing as a warm bath, with a good 2-hours relief: a great way to span the gap while waiting for oils or edibles to take effect.”

“I don't see why people are saying this is a good day time strain...  This is amazing for sleeping and buy it any time I can.  Mine was 100% indica, which I believe is what it is supposed to be.  Probably the most gorgeous buds you'll find.  

Usually one bowl and it's all she sang.  If you are getting 100% indica, and have a low tolerance, you will be in for a wild ride, take it easy!

VERY SMOOTH SMOKE!!!”
“Super sleepy vibes, consistently. Never a let down, seems to be real common strain to find.”

“My fiance' and I tried this strain and immediately fell into the giggle fits. Definitely a good relaxing strain. I had a little bit of nausea but that eventually subsided after consuming an entire pizza. 9.5/10”

“Afghani produces a strong mind and body numbing high, very relaxing and great for pain relief,but beginners beware this stuff knocks me on my ass! A hard hard hitting indica for sure would not recommend using in the day if u need to get shit done. Aside from the harsh smoke this is an amazing strain with great medicinal and recreational use.”

column1: Very Very nice look full dense yet easy to break up
column2: decked out in tric's very nice almost sweet pungent stink.

column3: “Great for Asthma!”
“this is a great hashish producer. very dank, heavy and sticky. easy strain to grow too. love it. highly recommend it.”

“Great keifing medium, very sticky and coated in resin glands great mid late day pain/sleep aid however more of a hashy taste and not as flavorful as my taste buds prefer bit makes up in potency what it lacks in taste. Also can be great tasting and good morning smoke if mixed with a potent citrus type flavor lemon diesel or a nice sweet sativa dom hybrid not to offset effectiveness for medical purposes.”
“Amazing Taste”

“(^-^)/* {=Afghani=}* \(^-^)

>>Wow, this weed was some of the danker fresh weed that I have bought. It was soo fresh when i first bought it, i thought it smelled like a dank tea, after smoking it i was dropped in to a sedated state with soo much headhigh it put me right to sleep. Insomnias worst nightmare. This weed knocks you right out.”
“Nice strain with an okay taste but its a good high”
“It helped with the pain in my knees and cleared my mind. It wasn’t a euphoric high but it did the job.”
“Knocked me on my ass and that is where I stayed”

“OK... Here's the thing: I vaped this after a long plane ride hoping it would knock me out and take away the symptoms of jet lag. It kind of did. I felt like I had popcorn cooking in my heart and my swollen ankles were like... pulsating in a good way. I give this 3 stars because while it did eventually knock me out it did not take away the body pain I was experiencing.”
“A nice strain for anxiety, but super sedating. Not recommended for daytime use.”

“I have low tolerance and one toke of this was pleasant. I would say it is medium in strength. It made me feel cerebral, contemplative, and calm. Good for relaxation and currently one of my favorites.

Not a strain to take in at large doses at a time, but small doses make for a nice experience that can really be felt in the calming of the body. I wouldn't recommend it for doing work. It seems to lean more towards the ...”
“Excellent for severe insomniacs. No paranoia, no racing mind, calmness, sleepiness and  really nice body buzz makes you float away. This will be on my go-to shelf permanently.”

“one of my favorite strains overall. This strain has a very relaxed feel and great body high. I gave it a four star because I felt like I was unproductive when I needed to get a few things done. If you smoke this strain you will get the munchies 100%.”
“Felt pretty chill, just wanted to relax and watch movies/ play videogames”
“My all around favorite medicine. Narcotic AF! Only from Oregrown”
“I liked this strain quite a bit.”

“Although I paid way too much for this 500mg Reef Cola oil cartridge in CO, I'm quickly happy w/ 1 hit. That's rare. 
Harsh as a motha to vape, but worth it. This will be that fine champagne when celebrating, when needing a happy numb body, or when no other indica will do. 
This be some mighty fine shit. Classic for a reason. 👌👍”
“Good”

“Cherry Afghan shatter great strain PR for sure even body high I felt my 3rd eye come to light with this strain.High felt like I was in zen with Shark Shock CBD flower.
Taste pop of light Cherry Skoal skunk taste amazing.
Love this strain during the day.
High lasted lasted a long time anxiety free for more than 4-6 hr's.”

“I just gotta say about this strain it is a RESILIENT plant. I have grown it multiple years and it always does good. I had thieves nearly rip it out the ground, mess up its light cycle before taking it outside and it grew and grew great. Others i messed up the light cycle became worthless and had to replace EXCEPT afghani. Probably excellent for beginning growers or growers in not so great growing locations or climate...”

“I use cannabis primarily for managing my anxiety, atopic dermatitis (eczema) and insomnia. This strain has proved to be amazing at helping me relax and get to sleep. It has an amazing calming earthy smell and as soon as I got a whiff I knew I was going to like it. I mainly vaped but I also used the ABV to make a tea with milk and honey and the tea proved to be absolutely amazing at helping me sleep. This strain is de...”
“Very good. High quality. Beware the couch lock,”

“This strain is very ancient and a favorite of mine.I love it both the flower and wax have a lovely flavor. I also like this strain because if it's potency and medical benefits. I would describe it's effects as happy, uplifting, euphoric and also alert, energetic. It also has the benefits of a relaxing body high, allowing my muscles to relax and therefore beridding my pain.”

“Very nice relaxing strain. If you have problems relaxing or sleeping this strain may be for you. It has a wonderful earthy smell and nice green nugs. I have problems with insomnia and I find this strain great at helping me sleep. I smoke a little while watching the tube which relaxes me and really helps with pain management and helps me get a good night's sleep. I use this and Northern Lights for my insomnia. It is o...”

“everytime I smoke this bud I feel super powerful and relaxed.”
“The bomb! don't pass it up you will be happy”
“Smoked it with thai and mexican strand to make trainwreck.. name says it all hits you like a freight train..”

“This stain is awesome! I had a migraine when I came home from work and smoked a few bowls. About 20 mins later  my head didn't hurt anymore, the pain in my back, neck, and shoulders were gone. My body is so relaxed that I wont have any problem falling and staying asleep tonight.”
“Very disappointed in this strain.  Had to buy another strain to combine it with.  Maybe I got a bad batch but because of it my opinion of afghani is tainted.  I give it a zero in all categories.”
“Its not the best but it sure isn't the worst. it wakes me up than once it starts to wear off it makes me relaxed, its good for people who have trouble sleeping”
“Perfect couch lock, my favorite to smoke when in bed watching Netflix or just chillin out. All around the perfect indica I like to always have around!”
“Looks great but that's it!!!”
“an old favorite of mine. cannot go wrong with an afghani strain”

“Had a few bowls of this along with some Blue Oyster. One of the best highs I ever had. Got me super giggly along with some munchies which I think were more from the Blue Oyster. After I got home from Subway all I wanted to do was chill on the couch. I didn't get much cottonmouth at all which was pretty awesome. This is a must try strain.”

“Wowee. Great strain for insomia and for after work right before dinner.. packed with resin! Sweet, earthy, and pungent tastes. Dense and packs a punch. One of my favorite indica that played the forefront for cross breeding excellent strains!”
“A good daytime medicine, not too heavy, not too light.”
“Pain”

“Breaks through the highest tolerances for a trippy, full-body high. 
10/10 would blaze again”

“This is the first strain of weed I ever smoked, it taste like spicy sausages as weird as it sounds, this strain will have you passing out if you just toke it up so watch out, its a heavy indica, you feel soooo relaxed , the nugs are so perfect and crystaly...mmmm I cant wait til I have this again...”
“This weed which was extremely potent had the best sweet flavor to it and was super smooth smoke no coughing. It gave me a high that had me giggling at every little thing. 3.5/5”

“ummm not that good mate”
“Good hash but i prefer weed.”
